## ‰ªãÁªç :tada: > A modern style notebook based on `tiddlywiki`. @oeyoews > Here is a [¬ª demo ¬´](https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw) ## ‰ªãÁªç :robot: > NEOTW ÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™ÁÆÄÊ¥Å„ÄÅÈ´òÊïàÁöÑÊñáÁ´†ÂèëÂ∏ÉÂπ≥Âè∞„ÄÇÊàë‰ª¨ÊîØÊåÅ‰∏≠Ëã±ÂèåËØ≠ÊñáÁ´†ÂèëÂ∏ÉÔºåÂêåÊó∂Êèê‰æõÈòÖËØªÊ®°ÂºèÂíåÁºñËæëÊ®°Âºè‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑÂàáÊç¢ÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®Âú®ÈòÖËØªÊñáÁ´†ÁöÑÂêåÊó∂‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ËΩªÊùæËøõË°åÁºñËæë„ÄÇ Êàë‰ª¨ËøòÊîØÊåÅ emoji ËØ≠Ê≥ïÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®Âú®ÊñáÁ´†‰∏≠Ê∑ªÂä†Êõ¥Â§öÁöÑË°®ÊÉÖÂíåÊÑüÊÉÖËâ≤ÂΩ©„ÄÇ > ÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøá URL ÂàáÊç¢‰∏çÂêåÁöÑÂ∏ÉÂ±ÄÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÈòÖËØª‰ΩìÈ™åÊõ¥Âä†Ëá™Áî±„ÄÇÂêåÊó∂ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨Ê†πÊçÆÁ≥ªÁªüËá™Âä®ÂàáÊç¢Â§úÈó¥/Êó•Èó¥Ê®°ÂºèÔºå‰πüÂèØ‰ª•ÈÄöËøá URL ÂàáÊç¢„ÄÇ Êàë‰ª¨ËøòÊîØÊåÅÁ¶ÖÊ®°ÂºèÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®Âú®ÂÆâÈùôÁöÑÁéØÂ¢É‰∏≠ÔºåÊõ¥Â•ΩÁöÑ‰∫´ÂèóÈòÖËØªÁöÑ‰πêË∂£„ÄÇ Âú® NEOTW ‰∏äÔºåÊÇ®ÂèØ‰ª•ÂèëË°®Ëá™Â∑±ÁöÑÊñáÁ´†ÔºåÂπ∂‰∏îÊîØÊåÅËØÑËÆ∫ÂäüËÉΩ„ÄÇÂêåÊó∂ÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰ºöËá™Âä®Â±ïÁ§∫ÊúÄËøëÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÊñáÁ´†ÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®ÂßãÁªà‰∫ÜËß£Âπ≥Âè∞‰∏äÁöÑÊúÄÊñ∞ËµÑËÆØ„ÄÇ ‰∏∫‰∫ÜËÆ©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÈòÖËØªÊõ¥Âä†ÁæéËßÇÔºåÊàë‰ª¨ËøòÁâπÂà´ÊîØÊåÅ‰∏≠Ëã±Êñá‰πãÈó¥Ëá™Âä®Ê∑ªÂä†Á©∫Ê†ºÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÊéíÁâàÊõ¥Âä†Êï¥Ê¥ÅÂíåÁæéËßÇ„ÄÇÂè¶Â§ñÔºåÊàë‰ª¨‰πüÊîØÊåÅÊ†áÈ¢òÂà´ÂêçÔºåËÆ©ÊÇ®ÁöÑÊ†áÈ¢òÊõ¥Âä†Á≤æÁæé„ÄÇ Ê¨¢ËøéÊù•Âà∞ NEOTWÔºåËÆ©Êàë‰ª¨‰∏ÄËµ∑‰∫´ÂèóÈòÖËØªÂíåÂàÜ‰∫´ÁöÑ‰πêË∂£ÔºÅ @Chatgpt > ËøôÊòØ‰∏Ä‰∏™Áî® TiddlyWiki ÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÊñáÊ°£ÔºåÂèØ‰ª•‰ΩøÁî® TiddlyWiki5.2.6 ÊàñÊõ¥È´òÁâàÊú¨ÊâìÂºÄ„ÄÇNeotw ÂåÖÊã¨Ëá™ÂÆö‰πâ CSS Âíå‰∏Ä‰∫õÊèí‰ª∂ÔºåÂèØÁî®‰∫éÁæéÂåñÂíåÂ¢ûÂº∫ TiddlyWiki ÁöÑÂäüËÉΩ„ÄÇËØ•ÊñáÊ°£Êèê‰æõ‰∫ÜÂÆâË£ÖÂíå‰ΩøÁî® Neotw ‰∏ªÈ¢òÁöÑËØ¶ÁªÜËØ¥ÊòéÔºå‰ª•ÂèäÂ¶Ç‰ΩïËøõË°åËá™ÂÆö‰πâËÆæÁΩÆÂíåÊ∑ªÂä†Êèí‰ª∂„ÄÇÂêåÊó∂ÔºåËØ•ÊñáÊ°£ËøòÊèê‰æõ‰∫Ü‰∏Ä‰∫õÊúâÂÖ≥ TiddlyWiki ÁöÑÂ∏∏ËßÅÈóÆÈ¢òËß£Á≠îÂíåÊúâÁî®ÁöÑÈìæÊé•„ÄÇÂ¶ÇÊûúÊÇ®ÂØπ TiddlyWiki ‰∏ªÈ¢òÂÆöÂà∂ÂíåÊèí‰ª∂ÂºÄÂèëÊÑüÂÖ¥Ë∂£ÔºåÊÇ®ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂú® tiddlywiki Á§æÂå∫‰∏≠ÊâæÂà∞ÊúâÁî®ÁöÑ‰ø°ÊÅØ„ÄÇ ## ÁâπÊÄß :sparkles: - ÈöèÊú∫Â±ïÁ§∫ÊñáÁ´† - ÊñáÁ´†Ê†áÈ¢òÊîØÊåÅ‰∏≠Ëã±ÂèåËØ≠Ë®ÄÂàáÊç¢ - ÊîØÊåÅÈòÖËØªÊ®°ÂºèÁºñËæëÊ®°Âºè‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑÂàáÊç¢ - ÊîØÊåÅ emoji ËØ≠Ê≥ï - ÊîØÊåÅÈÄöËøá url ÂàáÊç¢Â§öÁßçÂ∏ÉÂ±Ä - Ê†πÊçÆÁ≥ªÁªüËá™Âä®ÂàáÊç¢Â§úÈó¥/Êó•Èó¥Ê®°Âºè, ÊîØÊåÅ url ÂàáÊç¢Ôºå‰æãÂ¶Ç https://neotw.oeyoewl.top?mode=dark - ÊîØÊåÅÁ¶ÖÊ®°Âºè - ÊîØÊåÅËØÑËÆ∫ - Ëá™Âä®Â±ïÁ§∫ÊúÄËøëÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÊñáÁ´† - ‰∏≠Ëã±Êñá‰πãÈó¥Ëá™Âä®Ê∑ªÂä†Á©∫Ê†ºÔºåÊéíÁâàÊõ¥ÁæéËßÇ - Ê†áÈ¢òÊîØÊåÅÂà´Âêç - ... > **Warning** `Neotw` ÈÉ®ÂàÜÂäüËÉΩÊöÇÊó∂ËøòÊú™ÂçïÁã¨ÂÅöÊàêÊèí‰ª∂ÔºåÊàñËÄÖÈÉ®ÂàÜÂäüËÉΩ‰æùËµñ‰∏éÂÖ∂‰ªñÊèí‰ª∂, ‰∏çÂª∫ËÆÆÂçïÁã¨‰ΩøÁî® ## ÂÆâË£Ö :package: > **Ê≥®ÊÑè** > require git and npm and not compatible vanilla theme ```bash git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw cd neotw && npm install # install packages npm run start # start tiddlywiki on https://localhost:8099 ``` ## ‰∏ÄÈîÆÈÉ®ÁΩ≤ :gear: ## È°πÁõÆÁªìÊûÑ :open_file_folder:
FileStruct ```bash Neotw ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅarchive ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅCITATION.cff ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅdev ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅdist ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅfiles ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅimg ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅLICENSE ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅmakefile ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅnetlify.toml ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅnode_modules ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅoutput ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅpackage.json ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅpatch ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅREADME.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅscripts ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅsrc ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅstatic ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtemplates ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtest ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtiddlers ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtiddlywiki.info ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅvercel.json ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅyarn.lock # This structure may not be up to date ```

## Intro :tada: > A modern style notebook based on `tiddlywiki`. @oeyoews > Here is a [¬ª demo ¬´](https://oeyoews.github.io/neotw)
Intro ü§ñ > NEOTW is a concise and efficient article publishing platform. We support bilingual publishing in both Chinese and English, and provide a toggle between reading mode and editing mode, so that you can easily edit while reading articles. We also support emoji syntax, allowing you to add more expressions and emotional color to your articles. You can switch between different layouts through the URL, making your reading experience more flexible. In addition, we automatically switch between night/day mode based on the system, and you can also switch modes through the URL. We also support Zen mode, allowing you to enjoy reading in a quiet environment. On NEOTW, you can publish your own articles and comment on others' articles. We automatically display recently created articles, keeping you up to date with the latest news on the platform. To make your reading more beautiful, we also support automatic spacing between Chinese and English, making your typesetting more neat and beautiful. Additionally, we support title aliases to make your titles more exquisite. Welcome to NEOTW, let's enjoy the joy of reading and sharing together! @Chatgpt > This is a document created using TiddlyWiki, which can be opened using TiddlyWiki 5.2.6 or higher. Its main purpose is to introduce Neotw, which includes custom CSS and some plugins that can be used to enhance the appearance and functionality of TiddlyWiki. The document provides detailed instructions on how to install and use the Neotw, as well as how to customize settings and add plugins. Additionally, the document offers some common questions and useful links regarding TiddlyWiki. If you are interested in customizing TiddlyWiki themes and developing plugins, you may find useful information within the TiddlyWiki community. @Chatgpt
## Features :sparkles: - ÈöèÊú∫Â±ïÁ§∫ÊñáÁ´† - ÊñáÁ´†Ê†áÈ¢òÊîØÊåÅ‰∏≠Ëã±ÂèåËØ≠Ë®ÄÂàáÊç¢ - ÊîØÊåÅÈòÖËØªÊ®°ÂºèÁºñËæëÊ®°Âºè‰πãÈó¥ÁöÑÂàáÊç¢ - ÊîØÊåÅ emoji ËØ≠Ê≥ï - ÊîØÊåÅÈÄöËøá url ÂàáÊç¢Â§öÁßçÂ∏ÉÂ±Ä - Ê†πÊçÆÁ≥ªÁªüËá™Âä®ÂàáÊç¢Â§úÈó¥/Êó•Èó¥Ê®°Âºè, ÊîØÊåÅ url ÂàáÊç¢Ôºå‰æãÂ¶Ç https://neotw.oeyoewl.top?mode=dark - ÊîØÊåÅÁ¶ÖÊ®°Âºè - ÊîØÊåÅËØÑËÆ∫ - Ëá™Âä®Â±ïÁ§∫ÊúÄËøëÂàõÂª∫ÁöÑÊñáÁ´† - ‰∏≠Ëã±Êñá‰πãÈó¥Ëá™Âä®Ê∑ªÂä†Á©∫Ê†ºÔºåÊéíÁâàÊõ¥ÁæéËßÇ - Ê†áÈ¢òÊîØÊåÅÂà´Âêç - ... > **Warning** `Neotw` ÈÉ®ÂàÜÂäüËÉΩÊöÇÊó∂ËøòÊú™ÂçïÁã¨ÂÅöÊàêÊèí‰ª∂ÔºåÊàñËÄÖÈÉ®ÂàÜÂäüËÉΩ‰æùËµñ‰∏éÂÖ∂‰ªñÊèí‰ª∂, ‰∏çÂª∫ËÆÆÂçïÁã¨‰ΩøÁî® ## Installation :package: > **Note** > require git and npm and not compatible vanilla theme > ‰∏çÂª∫ËÆÆ‰ΩøÁî® root-tiddler ÂèÇÊï∞(ËôΩÁÑ∂‰ΩøÁî®ÊúâÂæàÂ§öÂ•ΩÂ§Ñ) ```bash git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/oeyoews/neotw cd neotw && npm install # install packages npm run start # start tiddlywiki on https://localhost:8099 ``` ## Deploy :gear: ## FileStruct :open_file_folder:
FileStruct ```bash Neotw ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅarchive ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅCITATION.cff ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅdev ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅdist ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅfiles ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅimg ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅLICENSE ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅmakefile ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅnetlify.toml ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅnode_modules ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅoutput ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅpackage.json ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅpatch ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅREADME.md ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅscripts ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅsrc ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅstatic ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtemplates ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtest ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtiddlers ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅtiddlywiki.info ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅvercel.json ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄüìÅyarn.lock # This structure may not be up to date ```

macrodef macrocallinline .o-btn-back { background-color: #00000008; border-radius: 50%; padding: 0 0 5px; margin: 0 0 9px; display: block; box-shadow: 0 5px 20px #0000001f } .o-btn-back:hover { 1.5em; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-text { margin-left: 0.3em; vertical-align: middle; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-invisible { font-size: 0.75em; } #stx-story-top .tc-btn-invisible:hover, #stx-story-top exports.random = function (n, t, r) { var e, o = [], a = [], i = parseInt(t.operand || '1'); if (isNaN(i)) { i = 1; } n(function (n, t) { a.push(t); }); while (i && a.length) { e = Math.floor(Math.random() * a.length); o.push(a[e]); a.splice(e, 1); i--; } return o; }; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"filteroperator"},"neotw-startup.js":{"title":"neotw-startup.js","text":"/*\ title: neotw-startup.js type: application/javascript module-type: startup neotw startup descption \*/ (function () { exports.platforms = ['browser']; border-radius: 50%; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; } .user-panel-avatar img { width: 100%; height: auto; max-width: 22px; max-height: 22px; border-radius: 50%; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; } "},"$:/SiteTitle":{"title":"$:/SiteTitle","text":"[img width=22 [$:/favicon.ico]] Neotw rolling "},"$:/SiteSubtitle":{"title":"$:/SiteSubtitle","text":"A modern notebook based on TiddlyWiki5 "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/templates/download-neotw-template":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/templates/download-neotw-template","hide-body":"yes","text":"\define saveTiddlerFilter() [[$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/browser-sniff]] -[[GettingStarted]] [is[tiddler]is[system]is[shadow]] [field:empty[yes]] [[$:/palette]] [[$:/theme]] [[$:/core]] [[$:/isEncrypted]] [[$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla]] [[$:/themes/nico/notebook]] [plugin-type[plugin]field:author[oeyoews]] [[$:/favicon.ico]] -[[$:/boot/boot.css]] -[type[application/javascript]library[yes]] -[[$:/boot/boot.js]] -[[$:/boot/bootprefix.js]] +[sort[title]] \end \define savingEmpty() yes \end {{$:/core/templates/tiddlywiki5.html}} "},"$:/themes/nico/notebook-mobile/js/notebookSidebarNav.js":{"title":"$:/themes/nico/notebook-mobile/js/notebookSidebarNav.js","text":"/*\ title: $:/themes/nico/notebook-mobile/js/notebookSidebarNav.js type: application/javascript module-type: global Closes the notebook sidebar on mobile when navigating \*/ (function () { /*jslint node: true, browser: true */ /*global $tw: false */ 'use strict'; const isOnMobile = () => { let bottombar = document.querySelector('.nc-bottombar'); return bottombar && bottombar.getClientRects().length > 0; }; const closeSidebar = () => { $tw.wiki.setText('$:/state/notebook-sidebar', 'text', undefined, 'no'); }; const closeSidebarOnMobile = () => { if (isOnMobile()) { console.log('closing sidebar'); closeSidebar(); } }; const setup = () => { $tw.hooks.addHook('th-navigating', function (event) { closeSidebarOnMobile(); return event; }); }; setup(); exports.closeNotebookSidebar = closeSidebar; })(); ","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"global"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/button/bili":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/button/bili","caption":"bili","description":"bili","","text":"\whitespace trim <$button tooltip="plugins" aria-label="" class=<>> {{neotw/icon/bili}} <$action-navigate $to="neotw/bili"/> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="bili"/> "},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/ui/download-neotw":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/neotw/ui/download-neotw","caption":"Download neotw","text":" <$list filter="[{$:/info/url/protocol}prefix[https]]">
